name: Super Plumber
description:
Super Plumber - shoot 'em up platformer, telling the story of a former policeman.



Many in their childhood dreamed of becoming superheroes, many even dreamed of it. John Pipe is a policeman who made a fatal error during his service. After leaving the police, he got a job as a plumber, but he is not very satisfied with his work. Now in dreams, John becomes a superhero and fights against evil. But in reality things are getting worse every day.



  • Retro graphics, stylized with old-school game consoles.
  • A dynamic soundtrack shakes!
  • The story of how one moment can change life forever.
  • Upgrade your character and weapon to smash the enemies even more intensively!
  • Tonns of blood and meat!
